intro: Palicourea yanesha, commonly known as Yanesha's palicourea, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Amazon rainforest, particularly in regions of Peru and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, round berries that are typically green when immature and turn red when ripe. Palicourea yanesha is often found in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical forests.
